author: palmbeachpost
title: Say it once, say it twice, 'Beetlejuice' is coming back to the...
text:
People must really love the '80s.
"Ghostbusters" are back in town.
"Top Gun" is going to fly again.
And you'll be hearing the ghost with the most's name all over the place soon.
>> Read more trending stories
Winona Ryder told Seth Meyers Monday night that she will be in the cast of "Beetlejuice 2," Time reported.
And she was excited to make the big announcement.
Ryder played the Goth character Lydia in the original 1988 "Beetlejuice."
There's no word on when shooting will begin or when it will be released, according to MTV News .
